content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I am interested in maximizing my rental income, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want the lowest possible rental price. Can you tell me your rental price?

Mister Heine: Yes, my rental price for this apartment is 1,200 Euros per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan: 1,200 Euros per month is quite high for me. I am looking for something more affordable. Can you consider lowering the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm sorry, I can't lower the rental price. This is the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. Are you interested in the apartment despite the rental price?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Juan: I understand the market rate, but I am still looking for something more affordable. I am not sure if I can afford 1,200 Euros per month. Can you consider lowering the rental price or providing any discounts or incentives?
name: Heinrich Heine
